text: Black Mirror is a British science fiction television series. It was created by Charlie Brooker, who also writes the episodes. The series mostly explores dystopian futures that could happen because of new technology, with a dark and satirical tone. The show is an anthology series, which means it has new stories and characters every episode. ==References== Category:British television series Category:Science fiction television series Category:Netflix original series Category:English-language television programs
title: Black Mirror
